## TokenPayload interface

The payload which is passed to the methods [JwtService.createToken()](./clm-core.jwtservice.createtoken.md)<!-- -->, [JwtService.createAccessAndRefreshToken()](./clm-core.jwtservice.createaccessandrefreshtoken.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TokenPayload 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_id](./clm-core.tokenpayload._id.md) |  | string | Id of the user |
|  [password](./clm-core.tokenpayload.password.md) |  | string | Password of the user as hashed-salt |
